scripts.bs: npm run build && npm run run-electron
scripts.bs-dev: npx cross-env DEBUG_PROD=true npm run build && npm run run-electron
scripts.prebuild: rimraf release/app/dist && npm run prepare-node && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.build: npm run prebuild && concurrently "npm run build:main" "npm run build:renderer" && node -r ts-node/register ./.erb/scripts/link-modules.ts
scripts.build-e2e: node scripts/setup-tests.js && cross-env E2E_BUILD=true NODE_ENV=test npm run build
scripts.build-e2e-dev: ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run prepare-node && cross-env E2E_BUILD=true concurrently "npm run build:main" "npm run build:renderer" "npm run build:web"
scripts.build-e2e-web: node scripts/setup-tests.js && cross-env E2E_BUILD=true NODE_ENV=test && npm run prepare-web-pro
scripts.build-e2e-web-dev: node scripts/setup-tests.js && cross-env E2E_BUILD=true NODE_ENV=test && npm run prepare-web-pro-dev
scripts.build:web: rimraf web/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=production TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true webpack --config ./.erb/configs/webpack.config.web.prod.ts
scripts.build:web:dev: rimraf web/dist && cross-env NODE_ENV=development TS_NODE_TRANSPILE_ONLY=true webpack --config ./.erb/configs/webpack.config.web.dev.ts
scripts.bump-version: npm run third-party && cd release/app && yarn version && cd .. && npm run version-meta
scripts.clean: npx rimraf node_modules && npx rimraf src/renderer/dist
scripts.clean-maps: npx rimraf --glob release/app/dist/**/*.map && npx rimraf --glob web/dist/*.map && npx rimraf --glob cordova/www/dist/*.map
scripts.cordova-add-android: cd cordova && cordova platform add android@9.1.0 && cd ..
scripts.cordova-add-ios: cd cordova && cordova platform add ios && cd ..
scripts.cordova-remove-android: cd cordova && cordova platform remove android && cd ..
scripts.cordova-remove-ios: cd cordova && cordova platform remove ios && cd ..
scripts.dev: npm run prepare-node && npm run generate-extensions && npm run link-ext && npm run start
scripts.dev-open-file: git apply run-with-args.patch && npm run dev
scripts.postinstall: npx rimraf node_modules/canvas && ts-node .erb/scripts/check-native-dep.js && electron-builder install-app-deps && npm run prepare-node && node -r ts-node/register ./.erb/scripts/link-modules.ts && npm run build:dll
scripts.install-ext-node: rimraf release/app/node_modules && cd ./release/app && npm install && cd ../.. && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.install-ext-node-win: rimraf release/app/node_modules && npm install --prefix ./release/app --platform=win32 --arch=x64 && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.install-ext-node-linux: rimraf release/app/node_modules && npm install --prefix ./release/app --platform=linux --arch=x64 && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.install-ext-node-mac: rimraf release/app/node_modules && npm install --prefix ./release/app --platform=darwin --arch=x64 && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.install-ext-node-mac-arm64: rimraf release/app/node_modules && npm install --prefix ./release/app --platform=darwin --arch=arm64 && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.install-ext-web: rimraf release/app/node_modules && cd ./release/app && npm install && cd ../.. && npm run generate-extensions
scripts.linux-fix-sandbox: sudo chown root:root node_modules/electron/dist/chrome-sandbox && sudo chmod 4755 node_modules/electron/dist/chrome-sandbox
scripts.package: ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && electron-builder build --publish never && npm run build:dll
scripts.package-android: npm run build:cordova && npm run clean-maps && cd cordova && npm install && cordova build --release android
scripts.package-ci: npm run postinstall && npm run build && electron-builder --publish always
scripts.package-linux: npm run install-ext-node-linux && ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && npm run clean-maps && electron-builder --linux --config resources/builder.json
scripts.package-linux-pro: npm run install-ext-node-linux && ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && npm run clean-maps && electron-builder --linux --config node_modules/@tagspacespro/tagspacespro/resources/builder-pro.json
scripts.package-mac: npm run install-ext-node-mac && ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && npm run clean-maps && electron-builder --mac --x64 --config resources/builder.json
scripts.package-mac-universal: npm run install-ext-node-mac && ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && npm run clean-maps && electron-builder --mac --universal --config resources/builder.json
scripts.package-mac-arm64: npm run install-ext-node-mac-arm64 && ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && npm run clean-maps && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --config resources/builder.json
scripts.package-mac-arm64-pro: npm run install-ext-node-mac-arm64 && ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && npm run clean-maps && electron-builder --mac --arm64 --config node_modules/@tagspacespro/tagspacespro/resources/builder-pro.json
scripts.package-mac-pro: npm run install-ext-node-mac && ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && npm run clean-maps && electron-builder --mac --x64 --config node_modules/@tagspacespro/tagspacespro/resources/builder-pro.json
scripts.package-mac-pro-universal: npm run install-ext-node-mac && ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && npm run clean-maps && electron-builder --mac --universal --config node_modules/@tagspacespro/tagspacespro/resources/builder-pro.json
scripts.package-mac-pro-dev: npx cross-env DEBUG_PROD=true && npm run package-mac-pro
scripts.package-pro: rimraf app/node_modules && node scripts/enablepro.js && npm run install-ext-node && npm run build && npm run package-web-pro && npm run package-win-pro && npm run package-linux-pro && npm run package-web-pro && npm run package-mac-pro
scripts.package-win: npm run install-ext-node-win && ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && npm run clean-maps && electron-builder --win --x64 --config resources/builder.json
scripts.package-win-pro: npm run install-ext-node-win && ts-node ./.erb/scripts/clean.js && npm run build && npm run clean-maps && electron-builder --win --x64 --config node_modules/@tagspacespro/tagspacespro/resources/builder-pro.json
scripts.prepare-cordova: npm run install-ext-web-check && npm run postinstall-cordova-check && rimraf cordova/www/dist && rimraf cordova/www/node_modules && shx cp -rL release/app/node_modules cordova/www && shx cp LICENSE.txt cordova/www
scripts.prepare-cordova-pro: npm run install-ext-web-check && npm run postinstall-cordova-check && rimraf cordova/www/dist && rimraf cordova/www/node_modules && shx cp -rL release/app/node_modules cordova/www && shx cp node_modules/@tagspacespro/tagspacespro/EULA.txt cordova/www
scripts.prepare-node: npm run install-ext-node-check && npm run postinstall-electron-check
scripts.copy-web: npm run install-ext-web-check && npm run postinstall-aws-check && rimraf web/modules && shx mkdir -p web/modules/@tagspaces/extensions && shx cp -rL release/app/node_modules/@tagspaces/extensions/* web/modules/@tagspaces/extensions/
scripts.prepare-web: npm run copy-web && shx cp LICENSE.txt web && npm run build:web && node scripts/genswconf.js && npm run clean-maps
scripts.copy-web-pro: npm run copy-web && npm run prepare-web-pro-ext && shx cp node_modules/@tagspacespro/tagspacespro/EULA.txt web
scripts.prepare-web-pro: npm run copy-web-pro && npm run build:web && node scripts/genswconf.js && npm run clean-maps
scripts.prepare-web-pro-dev: npm run copy-web-pro && npm run build:web:dev && node scripts/genswconf.js
scripts.prepare-web-pro-ext: shx mkdir -p web/modules/@tagspacespro/extensions && shx cp -rL release/app/node_modules/@tagspacespro/extensions/* web/modules/@tagspacespro/extensions/
scripts.run-android: npm run prepare-cordova && npm run build:cordova && cd cordova && cordova run android && cd ..
scripts.run-android-dev: npm run prepare-cordova && npm run build:cordova:dev && cd cordova && cordova run android && cd ..
scripts.run-ios-dev: npm run prepare-cordova && npm run build:cordova:dev && cd cordova && cordova run ios && cd ..
scripts.run-web-extensions: npm run copy-web-pro && npm run copy-web-extensions && npm run gen-third-party-extensions && npm run build:web && node scripts/genswconf.js && node scripts/webserver.js
scripts.skip:husky:pre-commit: node -e "require('fs').rename('./.git/hooks/pre-commit', './.git/hooks/pre-commit.disabled', function(err) { if (err) console.log(err); console.log('File successfully renamed!') })"
scripts.source-map: npm run source-map-app && npm run source-map-web && npm run source-map-cordova
scripts.start: ts-node ./.erb/scripts/check-port-in-use.js && npm run prestart && npm run start:renderer
scripts.test-clone-data: rimraf tests/testdata && git clone https://github.com/tagspaces/testdata tests/testdata
scripts.test-playwright: npx playwright install --with-deps && cross-env npx playwright test --project=electron-light
scripts.test-playwright-one: npx playwright install --with-deps && cross-env npx playwright test --project=electron  -g '/TST0632/'
scripts.test-playwright-pro: npx playwright install --with-deps && cross-env npx playwright test --project=electron
scripts.test-playwright-s3: npx playwright install --with-deps && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npx playwright test --project=electron-s3
scripts.test-playwright-minio: npx playwright install --with-deps && cross-env npx playwright test --project=electron-minio
scripts.test-playwright-web: npx playwright install --with-deps && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider npx playwright test --project=web-s3
scripts.test-playwright-web-headless: npx playwright install --with-deps && cross-env NODE_OPTIONS=--openssl-legacy-provider HEADLESS_MODE=true npx playwright test --project=web-s3
scripts.test-playwright-web-minio: npx playwright install --with-deps && cross-env npx playwright test --project=web-minio
scripts.test-playwright-web-headless-minio: npx playwright install --with-deps && cross-env HEADLESS_MODE=true npx playwright test --project=web-minio
scripts.test-pw-web-browsers: npm run test-refresh-data && cross-env DEBUG=pw:api npx playwright test --config ./playwright.config.web.browsers.js -g '/\bweb\b/'
scripts.test-refresh-data: rimraf tests/testdata-tmp && shx mkdir -p tests/testdata-tmp/file-structure && shx cp -rL tests/testdata/file-structure tests/testdata-tmp && npx playwright install --with-deps
scripts.ts-extension-symlink: rimraf app/node_modules/@tagspaces/extensions && cd app/node_modules/@tagspaces && ln -s ../../../extensions extensions && cd ../../..
